name: Slackcloud
description: Generates word clouds using Slack chat history

SLACK_AUTH.description: Bot User OAuth Access Token. It will begin 'with xoxb-'

SLACK_TEAMID.description: Unique identifier for your slack workspace. See the readme for where to find this value.

SLACK_CMD1_NAME.description: The name of the Slash Command you create for your slack app.

SLACK_CMD1_TOKEN.description: Your slack app verification token. This can be found in the Basic Information tab for your app.
